com.threecrickets.prudence.util
Class UnifyMinifyFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.Restlet
      org.restlet.routing.Filter
          com.threecrickets.prudence.util.UnifyMinifyFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Uniform
Direct Known Subclasses:
CssUnifyMinifyFilter, JavaScriptUnifyMinifyFilter
public abstract class UnifyMinifyFilter
extends Filter

A Filter that automatically unifies and/or minifies source files, saving them as a single file. Unifying them allows clients to retrieve the source via one request rather than many. Minifying them makes them retrievable faster.

This filter can track changes to the source files, updating the result file on-the-fly. This makes it easy to develop and debug a live site.

Note that this instances of this class can only guarantee atomic access to the unified/minified version within the current VM.

Author:
Tal Liron
